title: verify ccl policy with custom tag with one or two categories
custom_summary: verify ccl policy with custom tag with one or two categories
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running
custom_steps:
steps:
1.login to webui
2.Go to Policies->Real time Protection
3.Click New Policy -> Public app Access
4.create block cci policy with category one or two categories and custom tag(cloud storage, socail etc)
custom_expected:
1.File upload/download should be blocked in block 
2.The action generates an Block
3.The object type is file and activity should be upload/Download
5.The alert and skopeIT event should contain proper object , object_id , device , OS , browser , From user , Alert type 
, alert , action generated , alert name , policy name
